Reviews.Content: husband sisterinlaw wonderful stay hotel le regent recently location excellent short walk louvre musee dorsay notre dame tour cruises seine lots excellent cafes hotel trouble finding eat clean decent size reserved superior deluxe share little tight extra bed bigger expected bathroom nice size shower water pressure nice days sightseeing overlooked street noise cafes bad visit week dont weekend hotel staff extremely helpful particularly elias perfect directions getting sights including seine cruise trip versailles provided recommendations eat price comparable hotels looked location makes value negatives elevator luckily 2nd floor elevator arrival departure luggage slowness internet connection definitely stay future visit recommended hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, small room”
Reviews.Author: PeteL92833
Reviews.Content: location handy shops restaurants plus notre dame louvre musee dorsay hotel website photos makes property look lot fancier 61 hard believe day age internet terminal available ok person tight unless little luggage starbucks corner value breakfast charge 14 euros

Reviews.Title: “Great location, smallish room”
Reviews.Author: msu_mom
Reviews.Content: loved location hotel lots restaurants nearby walk sites metro station short walk doors little buy crepes sandwiches drinks hours lively paid 230 euros night typical paris bathroom nice glass half shower door wasnt properly sealed corner causing water leak onto floor towels fluffy staff pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic! High recommended!!”
Reviews.Author: ttjv2000
Reviews.Content: stayed september 2010 3 nights 5 night stay le bristol highend swanky hotel 8th preferred le regent hotel staff excellent helpful esp night watch superior 6th floor spacious anticipated decor lovely bathroom clean faced onto rue dauphine construction day sleep perfectly night lively streets below bed twins pushed sheet size king incredibly comfortable cozy duvet bar fridge perfect storing water snacks television werent paris watch tv price 230 eurosnight reasonable esp paris value money location hotel ideal stayed day half comfortable walking finding eat shop corner amazing street walked 6 hours day exploring paris soaking hotel walking distance destinations sorbonne rue luxembourg gardens notre dame marais district louvre seine eiffel tower 30 minute walk close metro incredibly easy hard home

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, Location, and Room”
Reviews.Author: rhinette
Reviews.Content: sandrine albert staff wonderful helped stay paris enjoyable feel welcome hotel location perfect sightseeing eating luxury superior 11 pretty comfortable neighborhood boisterous night sleeping air conditioning appreciated paris temps upper 80s definitely stay
